name: Immortal Cultivation Heroes (Doupo Chapter)
description: Add a Inferno hero named Xiao Yan, an Comflux hero named Xiao Xun'er, a Dungeon hero named Medusa, a Tower hero named Yao Chen, and a Fortress hero named Little Doctor Fairy.
author: L

1.0.0: Add a Hell hero named Xiao Yan, an Elemental City hero named Xiao Xun'er, a Dungeon hero named Medusa, a Tower hero named Yao Chen, and a Fortress hero named Little Doctor Fairy.

chinese.name: 修仙英雄（斗破篇）
chinese.description: 添加一个地狱英雄萧炎，一个元素城英雄萧熏儿，一个地下城英雄美杜莎，一个塔楼药尘，一个要塞英雄小医仙。
